attributes.action: Make the tv presenter Phillip Schofield the face of the 50 pound note.
attributes.additional_details: He’s a laugh alright get him on that note or maybe even a smaller note like 10 or 5 so more normal people will see him on their money , cause when was the last time you had a 50 pound note.
attributes.background: Phillip Schofield is an admirable option for the 50 pound note. He has presented funny and easy tv watch morning tv for years. His connection to today’s youth is ever more prominent, not to mention all the mums love him. He is a national treasure and he destroyed Katie Hopkins that time.

rejection.details:
Bank notes are the responsibility of the Bank of England, which is independent of the Government and Parliament.

You can find out how the Bank decides who will be on bank notes here: 
http://www.bankofengland.co.uk/banknotes/Pages/characters/selection.aspx
